definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: have inordinate affection, lust (cf. Ar. 9ajiba wonder, admire, 9ajiybun beloved; and (on sens. obsc. in NH) Levy:NHWB iii. 616);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[עָֽגְבָה]] Ez Eze 23:7, Eze 23:9, Eze 23:12; Impf. 3 fs. [[וַתַּעְגַּב]] v:Eze 23:5, + v:Eze 23:16 Kt (Qr [[וַתַּעְגְּבָה]]), [[וַתַּעְגְּבָּה]] v:Eze 23:20 (Ew:§ 191 c Ol:§ 228 b); Pt. pl. [[עׂגְבִים]] Je 4:30; —lust after ([[עַל־]]), only in fig. of relations of Samaria and Jerus. (personif.) with foreigners Ez Eze 23:5, Eze 23:9, Eze 23:12, Eze 23:16, Eze 23:20, so c. acc. v:Eze 23:7; pt. as subst. paramours Je 4:30.
